page.title: 12SERVICES IN PLYMTREE
page.content:
BUS SERVICES: Weekly to Cullompton and to Exeter. Twice weekly to Honiton. SCHOOL BUS SERVICE to Cullompton Comprehensive School in term time. REFUSE COLLECTION once a week. MEDICAL SERVICES: Doctors - served by 2 Group Practices at Cullompton. Sur- gery at Plymtree on Tuesday mornings. Health Clinic - at Cullompton for chiropody, ante-natal, etc treatment. MEDICAL PRESCRIPTIONS DELIVERED free to patients by Cullompton Chemists. VILLAGE CONTACTS for information on SOCIAL SERVICES and PUBLIC TRANSPORT.
LIBRARY VAN; DELIVERY VANS for meat, bread, fish; HAIRDRESSER; WINDOW CLEANER.
Through the Village Shop: DRYCLEANING; PHOTOGRAPHIC PRINTING.
